Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.util

Class ChartConfiguration

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.util.ChartConfiguration
public class ChartConfiguration extends Object
Configurations for charts
Author:
Jan-Mathis Hein, Achim Zielesny

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ChartConfiguration()
    Creates a ChartConfiguration object with default configurations

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    getHasLastPointMarked()
    True: The last point of the chart is marked, false: It is not
    boolean
    getHasTrendLine()
    True: Show the trend line for the chart data, false: Don't
    boolean
    getIsFillColorWhite()
    True: The fill color of the shapes in the chart is white, false: The fill color of the shapes in the chart is black
    boolean
    getIsInverted()
    True: The colors of the chart are inverted, false: They are not

    getIsOutlinePaintWhite()
    True: The outline paint of the shapes in the chart is white, false: The outline paint is not used
    boolean
    getIsShapePaint()
    True: Shapes are painted, false: Shapes are not painted
    boolean
    getIsThickLines()
    True: The chart has thick lines, false: The chart has thin lines

    getNumberOfDiscardedInitialPoints()
    Returns number of points that will be initially discarded from the chart data
    int
    getNumberToAverage()
    Returns number of y-values of the chart data to average
    double[]
    getZoomValues()
    Returns the zoom values for the chart {xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax}

    hasZoom()
    True: There are zoom values for the chart, false: There are not
